class_notes: MSPH students only. EPI students register for 4 credit hours, GLEPI students register for 2 credit hours. Please make sure you register for the appropriate credit hours. The default is 1 credit hour. You must adjust to meet your degree requirements.
course_description: Enables students to apply the principles and methods learned in an academic setting through the preparation of a monograph that embodies original research applicable to public health, incorporating a hypothesis that has been successfully evaluated with appropriate statistical and epidemiological techniques and is potentially publishable and has public health impact. Graded S/U.
sections: Class Nbr: 3326, Section #: 1, Type: THE, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. Christiansen-Lindquist, Status: Open
